items.title: Denmark postal service to stop delivering letters
items.description: The decision will end 400 years of the company's letter service, and postboxes will disappear from June.

items.title: General's arrest violates South Sudan peace deal, opposition says
items.description: Two close allies of the vice-president, a bitter rival of the president, are arrested.

items.title: What does the Department of Education do - and can Trump dismantle it?
items.description: The president has pledged to eliminate the federal agency that oversees the US education system.

items.title: Trump issues 'last warning' to Hamas as US confirms direct hostage talks
items.description: The president also appeared to threaten civilians in Gaza, saying they would be "dead" if they held hostages.

items.title: Sexual harassment petition against Nigeria's senate president dismissed
items.description: A senator accused Godswill Akpabio of harassing her - allegations he denied.
